澄.definition: (of liquid) to settle; to become clear

澄城.definition: Chengcheng County in Weinan 渭南[Wei4 nan2], Shaanxi

澄城縣.definition: Chengcheng County in Weinan 渭南[Wei4 nan2], Shaanxi

澄海.definition: Chenghai District of Shantou city 汕頭市|汕头市[Shan4 tou2 Shi4], Guangdong

澄海區.definition: Chenghai District of Shantou city 汕頭市|汕头市[Shan4 tou2 Shi4], Guangdong

澄清.definition: to settle (of liquid); to become clear (by precipitation of impurities); precipitate (chemistry); to put in order; to quell disturbances
